cmp: 留 (leave (message)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve)
mng: to slip away, to escape in stealth, to skate

exm.mng: to slip away, to escape in stealth, to skate

to stroll, to go for a walk

orderly, tidy, smooth
